      • getHints

        public static java.util.Set<java.lang.String> getHints(java.lang.Object value)
        Create initial hints for a value.
        Parameters:
        value - value to examine. May be null, concrete class, array or Collection
        Returns:
        set of hints deduced from the submitted value, may be empty.
